Articles.Content: Hello, I am not sure if this is the correct section to post this but I cannot find a better place to do it. I was wondering how I can get an earlier version of KSP for mods since many are not up to date on the current version. Thank you in advance for your help.

It depends on what earlier version you'd like.

I know Beta 0.90 is still available for download on the KSP website; but I don't know if there is a legal way to get older versions.

Also, you could probably find 1.0 to 1.0.3 somewhere on the website, but I'm not sure.

If the mod you want says it's current for version 1.0 or 1.0.2, then it will more than likely run in 1.0.4. I have three that complain that they aren't compatible every time I start up. They work perfectly well. The changes from 1.0 to 1.0.4 aren't huge.
